alert.note: Alert for Scott; Yell (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 11 at 9:46PM CDT until March 11 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Scott County in western Arkansas... Southwestern Yell County in central Arkansas... * Until 930 PM CST. * At 846 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Beauchamp, or 11 miles southwest of Waldron, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Waldron... Beauchamp... Gravelly... Fourche Valley... Muddy Creek WMA... Union Hill... Chula... Olio... Cedar Creek... Waltreak... Bluffton... Y City... Nola... Needmore... Harvey... Boles... Parks... Blue Ball... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
